p: Recently, a significant number of DH efforts have emerged because of the unprecedented global strain of COVID-19 on healthcare systems. This article reveals that digital technologies can be used at different stages of the COVID-19 outbreak, including data-driven disease surveillance, screening, triage, diagnosis, and monitoring. Methods that could potentially reduce the exposure of healthcare providers to the virus will also be discussed. The review aims to guide further development in DH to improve infectious disease control.
